Your critical attack is replaced with Stormbreaker Hurl, alloying you to launch your weapon. Shock your foes on hit every 5s. Occasionally, a lightning bolt may be called down from above.
[Stormbreaker Hurl ragdolls and strikes opponents with lightning. When using Stormbreaker Hurl, you cannot attack, but you may parry.]
[Refer to the effects of the Storm Enchantment.]

tears of the edenkite.name: Tears of the Edenkite
tears of the edenkite.desc:
On critical attacks and flourishes, produce homing bubble projectiles. 20s CD.
[Projectiles stun opponents.]

umbral knight.name: Umbral Knight
umbral knight.desc:
On hit, the Umbral Knight will strike your foes for 20% of your weapon's damage after a 0.25s delay. 5s CD.
[This delayed attack is parryable.]

vampirism.name: Vampirism
vampirism.desc:
Your weapon attacks drain health from your foes and replenish your blood.
[Temporary Health gain is 15% of damage dealt. Reduced when used on Primadon and the Scion of Ethiron. Heavily reduced when used on Chaser.]

void.name: Void
void.desc:
Every enemy you slay while equipping this weapon will always be Drowned. Enemies hit will also experience reduced healing.
[Whenever you execute/grip any player, they immediately get sent to the Depths.]

windswept.name: Windswept
windswept.desc:
After landing enough stacks, proc Winded on your opponent. The duration scales with weapon investment.
[HVY Basic Attacks: 3, MED Basic Attacks: 4, LHT Basic Attacks: 5]
[The duration of the effect scales on your weapon stat investment, and has a 5 second cooldown regardless of investment.]
[Minimum duration of 0.5 seconds, gaining 0.05s per weapon investment point.]

wild.name: Wild
wild.desc:
On hit, deal 85% of your weapon's damage in an AoE. This AoE cannot hit allies or the enemy originally hit. Reduces your damage against allies by 50%.
[Damage modifiers do not apply to this 85%.]

harrowing.name: Harrowing
harrowing.desc:
Obscures your opponent's health, posture, and armor bars.
[The effect is yellow and purple, and is very ugly.]

curse of authoritative.name: Curse of Authoritative
curse of authoritative.desc: On critical, uppercut, or flourish, apply Authoritative on your opponent, making them take 50% more posture damage. When you get guardbroken, take 50% more damage.

curse of the bloodthirsty.name: Curse of the Bloodthirsty
curse of the bloodthirsty.desc:
Deal +10% weapon damage and drain the blood of your foes, but suffer blood loss if your weapon attacks miss.
[Loses 1% of your blood upon missing an M1, only occurs when above 10% HP.]

curse of the no life king.name: Curse of the No Life King
curse of the no life king.desc:
Grants passive regen and damages the sanity of your foes, but succumb to insanity much faster, lose twice as much blood, and never be more than a step away from death. The amount of healing scales with your weapon stat invested.
[Every M1 gives reduces 2% of your opponent's sanity. 2x blood loss while equipped.]
[**Permanently stained health bar while equipped. If you die, you will go to the Depths.**]
[You lose 2 sanity per second while unsheathed in the Depths. Your head can pop due to this, so be careful.]
[Disabled in Arena/Chime. Disables **your** Viscosity.]

curse of repulsion.name: Curse of Repulsion
curse of repulsion.desc:
When you block attacks, you knock your attacker backwards. You receive +30% chip damage.
[Presumed: Your opponents get 30% chip damage **against you**.]

curse of ysley's ember.name: Curse of Ysley's Ember
curse of ysley's ember.desc:
Once enough stacks have been applied, the Fire of Life germinates. The explosion deals a random amount of damage and grants temporary health to the affected targets.
[HVY Stacks: 3, MED Stacks: 4, LHT Stacks: 5]

curse of the unbidden.name: Curse of the Unbidden
curse of the unbidden.desc:
Your critical attack is replaced with Unbidden Counter, restoring posture and stunning your attacker. Your attacks drain Ether on hit.
[Your attacks cause a purple portal to appear, which is when opponents have Ether drain. They also deal reduced damage. Landing Unbidden Counter cancels all damage and reduces damage to you by your opponent for an unspecified amount of times.]
[Successfully countering an unknown number of times will cause your critical to be changed to a stronger variant that applies knockdown.]

curse of yun'shul.name: Curse of Yun'Shul
curse of yun'shul.desc:
Has a chance to inflict a curse that deals percentage damage, but who it falls upon is often down to luck.
[On proc, deal 10% of your max HP as physical damage. Upon getting hit, there's a smaller chance to take self-damage for 10% of your HP.]
[Deals bonus damage in PvE.]
[No matter who it procs on, it will go on a 10s cooldown.]

astral.name: Astral
astral.desc:
Grants +20% weapon damage in PvE. Call down stars alongside your critical attacks, and after parrying thrice.
[Bypasses PvE damage cap.]
[Cannot be obtained with the Deepshore Fossil; can only be obtained through the Resonant Dawn event or from the Moon's Eyrie.]

adhesive.name: Adhesive
adhesive.desc:
Pulls your attacker towards you.
[No cooldown.]

allure.name: Allure
allure.desc:
Incoming hits may Charm your attacker for 10s.
[All Charm-related Talents that the user has are applied on proc.]

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.desc:
Incoming hits may bounce your attacker away.
[20% chance of occurring. Makes it harder to chain attacks and land combos.]

displacement.name: Displacement
displacement.desc:
Incoming hits may proc Displacement, granting a speed boost and clearing all stuns present.
[Grants hyperarmor on proc.]

drowned.name: Drowned
drowned.desc: Bolster the stats of your equipment, adding an additional +10 Health +10 Ether, 5% Damage Vs. Monsters and +5% Monster Armor.

entanglement.name: Entanglement
entanglement.desc:
Incoming hits may proc Entangled Defence, reducing your speed in exchange for 10% damage reduction.
[The 10% damage reduction lasts for the next 5 attacks.]

ferocity.name: Ferocity
ferocity.desc: Incoming hits may proc a speed boost and deal reduced damage. Both the speed boost and damage reduction scale with your current Tempo.

multiplicity.name: Multiplicity
multiplicity.desc:
Incoming hits may grant you a random boon of Recovery, Healing, or Agility. 5s CD.
[Recovery is for Stomach/Water/Blood, Healing is for HP gain, Agility is for a speed boost(?).]

rain.name: Rain
rain.desc: Incoming hits may summon rainclouds above you.

stench.name: Stench
stench.desc:
Incoming hits may produce a Stench Cloud, gradually draining 3% of their health if not blocked.
[Looks like someone needs a shower!]

viscosity.name: Viscosity
viscosity.desc:
Incoming damage is converted into damage over time applied for 2.5s.
[User takes 1/10th of the initial damage every 0.25s.]
[Similar to the Deferred Weapon Enchantment.]
[The user cannot be knocked or executed unless they are hit while at 1% HP.]
[Disabled by Curse of the No Life King. Disables the effects of Poser's Ring on the user.]
